patthana16.53:1.1: Sanidassanasappaṭigho nasanidassano dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana16.53:2.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
